content:
直接宠物.cre文件上面加上这个代码就行了不可缺少任何一串才能显示

[selective grow creature]
    [using exp item]
        1
    [grow Atype item index]
        778866
    [item count for levelup]
        10
[/selective grow creature]

[event evolute creature]
    1004
[/event evolute creature]

下面解析词条意思

[selective grow creature]
    [using exp item]调用exe里的项目编码
        1
    [grow Atype item index]需要的消耗品编码(具体写法如下)
        778866
    [item count for levelup]在城镇吃多少个778866可以升级
        10
[/selective grow creature]

[event evolute creature]升到多少级之后可以变成下面这个宠物不可缺少（测试为不生效）
    1004
[/event evolute creature]

城镇使用的消耗品778866写法如下 .stk

复制#PVF_File


[name]
    `进阶宠物的食物食物`

[name2]
    `name2_778866`

[explain]
    ``

[grade]
    1

[rarity]
    2

[usable job]
    `[all]`
[/usable job]

[attach type]
    `[trade]`

[minimum level]
    1

[cool time]
    10

[icon]
    `Item/stackable/consumption.img`    997

[field image]

[stackable type]
    `[creature expitem]`    0

[move wav]
    `FOOD_TOUCH`

[stack limit]
    1000
